description: Main frontend React component implementing theme switching, file upload, and Q&A interface for a knowledge base assistant

methods.name: App()
methods.description: Main React functional component for the application UI, including theme toggle, upload area, and query interface

methods.name: toggleTheme
methods.description: Switches between light and dark themes

methods.name: handleFileSelected
methods.description: Handles the selected file and manages upload process with progress indication

methods.name: onFileChange
methods.description: Event handler for file input change event

methods.name: onDragOver
methods.description: Event handler for drag over in drag-and-drop area

methods.name: onDragLeave
methods.description: Event handler for drag leave in drag-and-drop area

methods.name: onDrop
methods.description: Handles file drop event in drag-and-drop area

methods.name: handleQuerySubmit
methods.description: Submits a user query to backend and handles response/errors

methods.name: renderQueryBar
methods.description: Renders the query input and response section

methods.name: renderUploadArea
methods.description: Renders the file upload drag-and-drop zone and related UI
